goal.en: Based on the unconstrained optimization course from the last semester, this semester we will focus on constrained optimization. The objective of this course is to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of contemporary optimization methods. By the end of the course, students should have practical experience in implementing optimization algorithms through various homework assignments.
goal.ch: 承續上學期關於非約束優化方法的課程，在這個學期主要講述約束優化的方法。本課程的教學目標是希望學生在修習本課程後，對於現今優化的方法有著全面的認識，並能透過作業有應用優化演算法的實作經驗。

content.en:
The course in this semester will extensively explore the theory and algorithms of constrained optimization problems. We will focus on teaching chapters 12, 15, 16, 17, and 18 of the textbook, with the content outlined as follows:
Chapter 12: This chapter primarily covers the fundamental concepts and theory of constrained optimization. The content includes the formal definition of constrained optimization problems, classification of constraint conditions, and some basic mathematical tools and theorems, laying the foundation for subsequent chapters.
Chapter 15: This chapter introduces fundamental algorithms for solving nonlinear constrained optimization problems. The content encompasses various numerical optimization techniques, such as gradient methods, Newton‘s method, etc., for handling nonlinear constraints.
Chapter 16: This chapter discusses algorithms for quadratic programming problems. Quadratic programming is a specific optimization form involving a quadratic objective function and linear or quadratic constraints. This chapter introduces methods for addressing this particular optimization form.
Chapter 17: This chapter delves into penalty and augmented Lagrangian methods. These methods are commonly used to transform constrained problems into equivalent unconstrained problems, incorporating penalty terms or Lagrangian multipliers to handle constraint conditions.
Chapter 18: This chapter may introduce sequential quadratic programming methods, an extension of traditional quadratic programming. The content includes steps for quadratic programming in each iteration, gradually approaching the global optimum.
content.ch:
本學期的課程將深入探討約束優化問題的理論和算法。我們將著重講授教科書第12、15、16、17、18章，內容分述如下：
第12章：這一章主要涵蓋約束優化的基本概念和理論，內容包括約束優化問題的形式化定義，約束條件的分類，以及一些基本的數學工具和定理，為後續章節奠定基礎。
第15章：這一章介紹解決非線性約束優化問題的基本演算法，內容包括不同的數值優化技術，如梯度法、牛頓法等，用於處理非線性約束條件。
第16章：這一章討論二次規劃問題的算法。二次規劃是一種特殊的優化形式，涉及到目標函數是二次的情況，並且約束條件是線性或二次的。本章介紹處理這種特殊優化形式的方法。
第17章：這一章深入探討罰項法和擴增拉格朗日法。這些方法通常被用來將約束問題轉換為等價的無約束問題，並且透過引入罰項或拉格朗日乘子來處理約束條件。
第18章：這章可能介紹順序二次規劃方法，這是一種延伸了傳統二次規劃的方法。內容包括在每次迭代中進行二次規劃的步驟，以逐漸逼近全局最優解。
